description: New organisers have stepped in after the event's long-term sponsors announced its postponement.
title: Isle of Man Santa Dash given reprieve as new organisers step in
title_page: Isle of Man Santa Dash given reprieve as new organisers step in - BBC News
maintext: A spokesman for Isle of Man Bank, which has organised the race for the past 19 years, said he "'wishes them well with their event and we look forward to resuming our event in 2021".
